SELECT ppi.id, ppi.purchase_code, ppi.CODE, ppi.order_id, ppi.purchase_num, ppi.STATUS, ppi.create_date, ppi.del_flag, pni.pni.content, pni.create_by,
oi.CODE AS orderCode, oi.materials_code, oi.total_price, oi.STATUS as orderStatus,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit FROM purchase_plan_info ppi LEFT JOIN purchase_need_info pni ON (pni.`code` = ppi.purchase_code) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON (oi.id = li.order_id) LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = oi.supplier_id) LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.CODE = ppi.CODE) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ppi.del_flag = 0 AND ppi.purchase_code = #{purchaseCode} ORDER BY ppi.create_date DESC
